page.title: 17Drusillas Zoo Park
page.content:
Drusillas Zoo Park is like a village. In addition to the zoo there are many shops and attractions. These include gift,wine,pottery,leather and garden shops,the butterfly house,a restaurant which specialises in English cuisine, and a cottage bakery. Many of the shops sell products made at Drusillas, such as fine pottery.
You can ride on a train which takes you on a journey around the zoo,one of the many attractions for children. There is a club for children to join which gives free tickets for the whole year and a regular news bulletin.
Each week in the summer there are different events put on making it a popular place for both young and old.
